server-https-port.title: https port to use
server-https-port.description: Caucase port to use for https connexion.

external-url.title: External http url
external-url.description: External http url which point to caucase on http. This url will be added in signed certificate as CRL distribution point URI

ca-subject.title: Subject of CA Certificate
ca-subject.description: CA certificate subject as string. The format is: /C=XX/ST=State/L=City/OU=OUnit/O=Company/CN=CA Auth/emailAddress=xx@example.com. Only /CN is mandatory.

max-request-amount.title: Number of pending csr to accept
max-request-amount.description: Number of pending csr to accept. If this limit is reached, no more csr will be accepted by the CA.

crt-life-time.title: Signed Certificate life time
crt-life-time.description: The time in seconds before a generated certificate will expire. Default: 365*24*60*60 seconds (1 year)

crl-life-period.title: CRL life time period
crl-life-period.description: Number of individual certificate validity periods during which the CRL is valid. Default: 1/50.0

ca-life-period.title: CA Certificate life period
ca-life-period.description: Number of individual certificate validity periods during which the CA certificate is valid. Default: 10

crt-keep-time.title: Time before cleanup certificate content on CA
crt-keep-time.description: The time in seconds before a generated certificate will be deleted on CA server. Set 0 to never delete. Default: 30*24*60*60 seconds (30 days)
